amendment.description: To provide trade adjustment assistance for service workers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 3109 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3109 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 80.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3109.
Amendment SA 3109 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S4753-4755) To provide trade adjustment assistance for service workers, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3109 proposed by Senator Wyden.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 3109 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 54 - 45. Record Vote Number: 80.
